mapper.select: SELECT A.WORKSTATUS_NO , A.WORKDATE , A.COMMUTE , A.LEAVE_WORK , A.WORKTYPE_CODE , B.MEMBER_NO , B.WORK_LATE_COUNT , B.TOTAL_EXTRA_WORK_HOURS FROM BB_WORKSTATUS A LEFT JOIN BB_WEEK_WORK_STATISTIC B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY A.WORKSTATUS_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BB_WORKSTATUS A ( A.WORKSTATUS_NO , A.WORKDATE , A.COMMUTE , A.LEAVE_WORK , A.MEMBER_NO , A.WORKTYPE_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_WORKSTATUS_NO.NEXTVAL , SYSTIMESTAMP , SYSTIMESTAMP , #{ lwork, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , 2 , 'C1' )
